oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: !kui A note by ||kabbo on |kannu, a 'Rain's man', who was ||kabbo's or person after his father's death. |kannu was shot in the dark by his grandson (called !kauken ka |a). The story is continued on p.2264v with further details of |kannu's murder and some details of the incident.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: The death of |kannu the Rain's man who was ||kabbo's person
